title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1220.26 - Persons unable to give satisfactory explanation of presence prohibited from loitering in terminal
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1220.26 - Persons unable to give satisfactory explanation of presence prohibited from loitering in terminal

State Regulations

No person, who is unable to give satisfactory
explanation of his presence, shall loiter in or about any toilet, area, station, station platform, waiting room or any other appurtenance of the
terminal. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1220.26

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
